lead_paragraph: SIMON--Myrna Barbara, 79, of Denver, CO, and New York City, passed away in Denver on March 26, 2016, due to complications from an auto- pedestrian accident. Born on February 11, 1937, in Brooklyn, NY, to Max and Ida Kiner, Myrna was raised in Bridgeport, CT, and graduated from Boston University in 1958. She was an elementary school teacher, homemaker, then devoted caregiver to her beloved husband of 49 years, David Robert Simon, who preceded her in death. Myrna loved all things New York City, especially its culture and cuisine, and she cherished Central Park walks with her David. She is survived by her daughter and son-in-law, Marianne and Rich Giangregorio, of St. Petersburg, FL; son and daughter-in-law, Geoffrey Simon and Cathy Kuo, of Denver, CO; grandchildren Erik, Elise and Emily; and many good friends. In lieu of flowers, please consider a donation to The Denver Hospice, 501 S. Cherry St., Ste. 700, Denver, CO, 80246, (303) 321-2828, www.thedenver hospice.org. 1/3
